content: around = 24 fasten_off first leg do not fasten_off second leg but work two additional single_crochet into next round - 2- copyright €andrea gaida 2010 crochet pattern abc-clown from andrea gaida akinnastisu for ravelry body and head continue in yellow changing to cräme when indicated keep legs together with matching sts feet are pointing slightly to the left and right side working through both layers of first and second leg r 1 single_crochet in first 4 sts of both legs single_crochet in next 20 sts 2ndleg and single_crochet in next 20 sts 1stleg = 40 r 2 single_crochet in next 17 sts 2 sts with single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 sts with single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 17 sts = 38 r 3 single_crochet in next 18 sts 2 sts with single_crochet decrease repeat 2 times single_crochet in next 16 sts = 36 stuff legs r 4 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2 sts with single_crochet decrease repeat around = 30 r 5-7 single_crochet in each st around = 30 r 8 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 sts with single_crochet decrease repeat around = 24 r 9 cid 129 11 single_crochet in each st around = 24 r 12 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 sts with single_crochet decrease repeat around = 18 r 13 2 sts with single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next st repeat around = 12 changing to cräme in last st of r 13 stuff legs and body r 14 2 single_crochet in each st around = 24 r 15 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat around = 30 r 16 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 4 sts repeat around = 36 r 17 single_crochet in first 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 5 sts repeat 5 times 2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in last 3 sts = 42 r 18 cid 129 20 single_crochet in each st around = 42 mark place for eyes between r 18 and 19 r 21 2 sts with single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 5 sts repeat around = 36 r 22 single_crochet in each st around = 36 r 23 2 sts with single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 4 sts repeat around = 30 r 24 single_crochet in each st around = 30 fix safety eyes 6 sts apart over r 18 and 19 embroider mouth and nose in red r 25 2 sts with single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 3 sts repeat around = 24 r 26 2 sts with single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts repeat around = 18 stuff head r 27 2 sts with single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next st repeat around = 12 r 28 each 2 sts with single_crochet decrease = 6 fasten_off sew safety eyes 6 sts apart between r 18 and 19 embroider mouth in red and nose in light pink - 3- copyright €andrea gaida 2010 crochet pattern abc-clown from andrea gaida akinnastisu
